user.title: MQTT Configuration
user.description:
Configure the MQTT topic for Tesla Fleet Telemetry.

Note: This integration requires MQTT to be configured in Home Assistant and a self-hosted Tesla Fleet Telemetry server publishing to MQTT.

data_description.mqtt_topic_base: Base topic used by Fleet Telemetry (e.g., 'tesla'). Messages will be received from tesla/VIN/v/#

error.vin_invalid_format: VIN contains invalid characters. Only letters (except I, O, Q) and numbers are allowed.

abort.mqtt_not_configured: MQTT is not configured in Home Assistant. Please set up MQTT first.

init.title: Tesla Fleet Telemetry Options
init.description:
Update the integration settings for your Tesla vehicle.

VIN: {vehicle_vin}

data_description.configure_telemetry: Enable to configure how often Tesla sends telemetry data

tesla_api.title: Tesla API Connection

data_description.proxy_url: URL of the vehicle-command HTTP proxy (e.g., https://localhost:4443)
data_description.tesla_token: Tesla OAuth access token. Auto-detected from tesla_fleet integration if available.

preset_select.title: Telemetry Preset
preset_select.description:
Choose a telemetry configuration preset or customize individual fields.

Presets optimize data collection for specific use cases.

custom_fields.title: Custom Telemetry Fields
custom_fields.description:
Configure individual field intervals. Set to 'Disabled' to stop receiving that field.

Lower intervals = more data usage.

error.connection_failed: Failed to connect to Tesla API. Check proxy URL and token.
error.apply_failed: Failed to apply telemetry configuration to Tesla.
error.no_fields_selected: At least one field must be enabled.
